name: Bloxxorz
description:
Run and jump for the high-score!

Click on the options you want.

Player 1 - Z to jump

Player 2 - X to jump

Player 3 - C to jump

Player 4 - V to jump

Combat mode: Player 1 is still Z and Player 2 is still X

The controls can be changed at any time in the menu bar at the top. (File, Players, the first "X" next to KEYBOARD will bring up the controls menu) Compatible with a game controller!
Click this text to view a post detailing my thoughts about the game and links to other projects.

Changelist:
